title: Can we address the massive amounts of dodges
body: I'm tired of spending 30 min just to get into a game. When everyone FINALLY accepts the game, It gets dodged. I was in 7 or 8 rooms before I finally got a game. People dodge because they don't want to play a zed, or their champ got banned. Or they were auto filled. Its getting old. I suggest harsher punishments all around. I think If you don't accept a game you should have a 5 min que timer every time. and if you dodge when a game gets accepted. 10 min que timer for the first 20 min for the second 30 min for 3+. I started looking for a game at 8:15 this morning. played ONE 32 min game, and now its 9:45. IMO I blame most of the dodges on autofill. I don't mind playing support so I don't dodge them but that seems to be the most likely culprit. Anyways rant over, I just want to get my voice out there that me, and everyone I play with are sick of the dodges, and just want to get into a game.
